amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $109.2 million provided for payment of U.S. arrearages to the United Nations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike $109.2 million in funding for payment of arrearages to meet obligations of membership in the United Nations and to pay assessed expenses of international peacekeeping activities.

action.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 261 (Roll No. 394).
